## Testing
<!-- Describe the tests you ran and how to reproduce them -->

### Test Checklist
- [ ] Unit tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] Integration tests pass
- [ ] Linter passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Build completes successfully (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Manual testing completed

### Test Commands
```bash
npm run lint
npm run build
npm test
```

## Verification Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code is properly commented, particularly in complex areas
- [ ] No console.log or debugging statements left in code

### Documentation
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, API.md, etc.)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
- [ ] JSDoc comments added/updated for new functions
- [ ] Environment variables documented in .env.example

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive information (secrets, keys, passwords) in code
- [ ] Input validation added for new endpoints
- [ ] Authentication/authorization properly implemented
- [ ] Security best practices followed

### Dependencies
- [ ] New dependencies justified and documented
- [ ] No unnecessary dependencies added
- [ ] Dependencies are up to date and secure

### Deployment
- [ ] Changes are backward compatible OR migration path documented
- [ ] Environment variables added to deployment configs
- [ ] Docker build tested (if Dockerfile changed)
- [ ] Railway/production deployment considerations documented
